Name: machinaris-mmx
Overview:
Adds on farming of the MMX blockchain to the main Machinaris application, alongside Chia. x86_64 required, MMX does not support aarch64.
  
  PREREQUISITE: Machinaris application, containing Chia blockchain, which this MMX container will register with. 
  
  INSTALL: Set the host path to first directory containing plots using '/plots1' Path. Add more Paths for additional host directories. Also be sure to set the LAN IP address of your Unraid server in the controller_host and worker_address variables.   
  
  SETUP: The MMX blockchain will be accessible within the Machinaris WebUI.  Don't forget to port-forward tcp/12334 at your router. A GPU is recommended, but not required.  See: https://github.com/guydavis/machinaris/wiki/MMX#can-i-use-my-gpu
  
  SUPPORT: Join the Discord server for fastest response: https://discord.gg/mX4AtMTt87 Ask a question or start a discussion on Github: https://github.com/guydavis/machinaris/discussions

worker_port.Name: worker_port
worker_port.Description: The TCP port to reach this worker at.  Leave at 8940 for MMX blockchain.

protocol_port.Name: protocol_port
protocol_port.Description: The TCP port for connecting to peers.  Port forward at your router.

farmer_port.Name: farmer_port
farmer_port.Description: The TCP port allowing harvesters to connect with on your LAN.  DO NOT port forward at your router.

plots_dir.Name: plots_dir
plots_dir.Description: A colon-separated list of all in-container paths (defined above) holding your completed plots.  Example: /plots1:/plots2:/plots3

controller_host.Name: controller_host
controller_host.Description: The IP address of your Unraid server on your LAN for controller/worker communication.

worker_address.Name: worker_address
worker_address.Description: Again, the IP address of your Unraid server on your LAN for controller/worker communication.

worker_api_port.Name: worker_api_port
worker_api_port.Description: The TCP port of the Machinaris worker for controller/worker communication.

mode.Name: mode
mode.Description: Determines which services Machinaris starts.  Default is everything (aka fullnode).

blockchains.Name: blockchains
blockchains.Description: The blockchain to farm.  Leave set to 'mmx'.

NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.Name: NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES
NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.Description: GPU(s) to use in container. See: https://docs.nvidia.com/datacenter/cloud-native/container-toolkit/user-guide.html#gpu-enumeration

OPENCL_GPU.Name: OPENCL_GPU
OPENCL_GPU.Description: OpenCL GPU type.  Leave blank if you have no GPU. Use exactly 'nvidia' if you have a supported Nvidia GPU. AMD and iPU not currently supported.

appdata.Name: appdata
appdata.Description: Holds app data for the container. Not for temp plotting or final plot mmxage.

plots1.Name: plots1
plots1.Description: Holds completed plots for farming. Create more Paths for additional folders like plots1,plots2,etc...

plotting.Name: plotting
plotting.Description: Your fast temp space for plotting, ideally a cache pool or unassigned SSD.
